segments.text: I was wondering if you could help me use the Student Job Center .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are many ways ; what kind of job would you like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to work in a restaurant .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine ! Will you need part-time or full-time work ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine , the two best ways are to use our local listings binders over there or you can use the computers with the Internet job listing sites . See them over there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I know what to do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , in addition , you can schedule an appointment with a job counselor on this list . If you would like to do that , sign here , OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I think that would be great .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine , well the job search tools are all here for you to use . Feel free to look around and use what works best for you . Have fun with it !
segments.speaker: S2
